page.title: 09Playground Games, N. Lopham
page.content:
In the playground of St.Andrew's school we play lots of games. Lots play marbles. There are lots of different marbles - e.g. mini, king size, clear, oily and one-ers. Lots also like to play 40-40, which is like Hide and Seek, but in 40-40 you say "40-40 see Vikky", or whoever has been seen.
We like playing Chains, when somebody is in the middle and calls someone's name and they have to try to get past. If they touch the person, he/she has to join the chain. If he/she does get across, the rest try and follow. Another popular game is Hop Scotch. You have to throw a stone and try to get it on a series of numbers and hop along them. If you don't get it on, it's another's turn.
